profileAlternative.name: Șerban Patriciu
profileAlternative.headline: SQL Server Database Developer and Administrator
profileAlternative.summary:
I wish to be part of a creative and professional team. For me, the continuous learning is very important for my career and my personal life.

My competencies are in the following areas:
1. Thorough theoretical and practical knowledge of SQL 2016 and SQL Azure (MCSE Data Management and Analytics).
2. Huge experience with the Microsoft Development platform and Visual Studio Online, acquired through the creation of complex systems and applications.
3. Deep knowledge of Test Driven Development using SQL Server and tSQLt database unit testing library.

aboutAlternative.text:
I wish to be part of a creative and professional team. For me, the continuous learning is very important for my career and my personal life.

My competencies are in the following areas:
1. Thorough theoretical and practical knowledge of SQL 2016 and SQL Azure (MCSE Data Management and Analytics).
2. Huge experience with the Microsoft Development platform and Visual Studio Online, acquired through the creation of complex systems and applications.
3. Deep knowledge of Test Driven Development using SQL Server and tSQLt database unit testing library.

positions.title: Senior SQL & Reports Developer
positions.description:
Working on complex SQL Server Reports and Transact SQL development in the context of a Software as a Service (SAAS) application (web site) that manages the environmental emissions of an enterprise.
Also working on maintaining the web site for the same application; the supporting technology is ASP.Net.

positions.title: Technological Solutions Developer (level 2)
positions.description: I participated at the development of an enterprise web site.

positions.title: Technical Consultant, Developer and Database Administrator
Technical Consultant, Developer and Database Administrator
positions.description:
1. Implementation of complex installations and upgrades from SQL 2012 to SQL 2016 and new SQL Azure configurations.
2. Office 365 Services Provisioning and Client Deployment.
3. Implementation of Active Directory networks using the Microsoft cloud for AX 2012 R3 installations.
4. Creation of many complex queries in SQL Server and SQL Server Reporting Services.
5. SQL Server tuning and monitoring; complex query tuning.
6. Windows server 2012 and 2016 installations and configurations.
7. Development of complex add-ins for the RMS System, which increase the functionality of Microsoft RMS. Among the representative projects are:
7.a. Payment add-in for a PIN pad using a specialized library. It has been deployed to over 100 stores distributed over Canada.
7.b. Development of an add-in to implement order delivery management, which is a functionality that does not exist in Dynamics RMS.
7.c. Development of an application that works in conjunction with RMS, to schedule appointments in Outlook and generate billing data in RMS using Outlook stored information.
7.d. Design and implement a data warehouse system to assist the management in sales forecasting for inventory items and purchase order creation.
8. Development of integrations between different systems.
8.a. Implement integration between RMS registered customers and cloud CRM.


…
see more

positions.title: Network Administrator
positions.description:
I've managed the Enterprise Network, working on a daily basis with Microsoft products and technologies (Windows 2000, .Net and SQL Server.

I also provided training in the area of database and network essentials to other enterprise employees.

positions.title: Database Administrator
positions.description: I maintained and administered the Enterprise Database Systems (Progress Software and MFG/PRO).

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description: Development and maintenance of financial applications, using FOXPRO

educations.title: University of Craiova, Faculty of Mechanics
